EmailTemplate.name: Swift_Layer_On_Hold_Pending_Layer_Chip_Warning
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Device <MST> Pending Resume at Chip Level
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Mask Set Title: <MST> Mask Layer(s): <LAYER> _________________________________________________________
Dear Sir/Madam,
Please note that the above mentioned layer status still reflect as Hold due to some layer chip record(s) are still on hold.
This is a system generated message, please do not reply. Best Regards.
#ECS
